scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const html=fs.readFileSync('index.html','utf8');const scripts=[...html.matchAll(/<script[^>]*>([\s\S]*?)<\/script>/g)].map(m=>m[1].trim()).filter(Boolean);const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const cp=require('child_process');let i=0;for(const src of scripts){i++;const f=path.join(os.tmpdir(),'slope-inline-'+i+'-'+Date.now()+'.js');fs.writeFileSync(f,src);const p=cp.spawnSync(process.execPath,['--check',f],{encoding:'utf8'});if(p.status!==0){console.error('inline chunk failed',i);console.error(p.stderr||p.stdout);process.exit(1);}}console.log('checked',scripts.length,'inline script chunks');"
